doc.after: Dilma Vana Rousseff born 14 December 1947 is a Brazilian politician who has been the President of Brazil since 1 January 2011 She is the first woman to hold the office She was previously the Chief of Staff to President Luiz In cio Lula da Silva from 2005 to 2010
